title: How to work as a freelancer for getting bitcoin for payments - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not entirely sure what you’re asking… As a freelancer you can accept bitcoin payments either by directly having your client transfer bitcoin to your wallet as payment or by using a service such as bitpay to accept payments in the form of bitcoin. If you’re asking, “how do i get paid in bitcoin?” I’d say you just offer it as a form of payment for the work that your’e doing. It’s still super early in the adoption of cypto, So I would assume few people actually use bitcoin for payment at this point. I’m sure there are some people who also are early adopters and do use crypto but, it will probably be a small group.
